summary: Completed comprehensive testing of ESP32 IoT Copilot Phase 3 features including ASCII Wiring Diagram Generator, Project Templates (6 templates), and Debug Assistant. All major features working correctly with excellent backend API performance and functional frontend integration.

minor_bugs.issue: Returns 520 status code instead of 400 when API key missing
minor_bugs.impact: Error handling works but wrong HTTP status code

ui_bugs.issue: Dialog overlay occasionally prevents clicking Debug button - requires force click to bypass
ui_bugs.workaround: Force click works, functionality is intact

design_issues.issue: Missing Description or aria-describedby warnings in console

passed_tests: ASCII Wiring Diagram API generates deterministic pin mappings
Wiring diagram includes GPIO21/22 for I2C, proper pin assignments
Wiring diagram detects and warns about pin conflicts
Templates API returns all 6 expected templates
Template structure includes all required fields (id, name, description, difficulty, components, idea)
Template instantiation creates new projects with pre-filled data
Templates page displays all templates with difficulty badges (beginner, intermediate)
Debug API analyzes all 4 error types (compilation, runtime, hardware, power)
Debug Assistant provides intelligent analysis for each error type
Bottom navigation shows 4 items (Projects, Templates, New, Settings)
Project detail page shows Wiring Diagram and Debug buttons
Wiring Diagram dialog opens and displays complete ASCII diagram
Debug Assistant dialog opens with 4 error type options
All error types selectable in Debug Assistant UI
Debug log input accepts text and enables Analyze button
Shopping List and Export buttons present in project detail
Template cards display correctly with features and learning topics
Template instantiation navigates to new project successfully
action_item_for_main_agent: Fix dialog overlay issue that occasionally prevents clicking Debug Assistant button. Consider adding z-index management or click-through handling for dialog overlays.
